name: Offroad Mania
description:
Offroad Mania — based on realistic car physics game for everyone, who like off road and challenge.

We've prepared for you 120 levels + free roam (rocks, trees, bridges, ramps and so on) and 5 amazing 4×4 off road cars (differents suspensions, engines) for fun driving.

FEATURED

  • 120 levels + free roam (rocks, trees, bridges, ramps and so on)
  • 5 amazing 4×4 off road cars (differents suspensions, engines)
  • Car physics based game
  • Car and driver customizing
  • Fun driving gameplay
  • Flat graphics (colorful and clean)
  • Gamepad support

FREE UPDATES

We plan to regularly improve the game with you (write your ideas in Community Hub and Discord).

HAVE OFF ROAD! HAVE FUN!
